mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member(M_memberNo, M_name, M_stuNo, M_phone, M_email, M_gender, M_discipline, M_grade, M_class, M_degreeNo, M_id, M_startTime, M_endTime, M_typeNo, M_password, M_power) VALUES(#{no}, #{name}, #{stuNo}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{discipline}, #{grade}, #{classNum}, #{degreeNo}, #{id}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{memberTypeNo}, #{password}, #{power});
mapper.select: SELECT m1.M_memberNo,m1.M_name,m1.M_stuNo,m1.M_phone, m1.M_email,m1.M_gender,m1.M_discipline,m1.M_grade, m1.M_class,d.DT_name,m1.M_id,m1.M_startTime,m1.M_endTime, m2.MT_name,m1.M_power,p.PT_name,m1.M_addScore, now()>m1.M_endTime as expired FROM Member m1, MemberType m2, PowerType p, DegreeType d WHERE m1.M_typeNo=m2.MT_no AND m1.M_power=p.PT_no AND m1.M_degreeNo=d.DT_no;

SELECT m1.M_memberNo,m1.M_name,m1.M_stuNo,m1.M_phone, m1.M_email,m1.M_gender,m1.M_discipline,m1.M_grade, m1.M_class,d.DT_name,m1.M_id,m1.M_startTime,m1.M_endTime, m2.MT_name,m1.M_power,p.PT_name,m1.M_addScore, now()>m1.M_endTime as expired FROM Member m1, MemberType m2, PowerType p, DegreeType d WHERE m1.M_memberNo=#{memberNo} AND m1.M_typeNo=m2.MT_no AND m1.M_power=p.PT_no AND m1.M_degreeNo=d.DT_no;

SELECT m1.M_memberNo,m1.M_name,m1.M_stuNo,m1.M_phone, m1.M_email,m1.M_gender,m1.M_discipline,m1.M_grade, m1.M_class,d.DT_name,m1.M_id,m1.M_startTime,m1.M_endTime, m2.MT_name,m1.M_power,p.PT_name,m1.M_addScore, now()>m1.M_endTime as expired FROM Member m1, MemberType m2, PowerType p, DegreeType d WHERE m1.M_email=#{email} AND m1.M_typeNo=m2.MT_no AND m1.M_power=p.PT_no AND m1.M_degreeNo=d.DT_no;

SELECT m1.M_memberNo,m1.M_name,m1.M_stuNo,m1.M_phone, m1.M_email,m1.M_gender,m1.M_discipline,m1.M_grade, m1.M_class,d.DT_name,m1.M_id,m1.M_startTime,m1.M_endTime, m2.MT_name,m1.M_power,p.PT_name,m1.M_addScore, now()>m1.M_endTime as expired FROM Member m1, MemberType m2, PowerType p, DegreeType d WHERE now()>m1.M_endTime AND m1.M_typeNo=m2.MT_no AND m1.M_power=p.PT_no AND m1.M_degreeNo=d.DT_no;

SELECT m1.M_memberNo,m1.M_name,m1.M_stuNo,m1.M_phone, m1.M_email,m1.M_gender,m1.M_discipline,m1.M_grade, m1.M_class,d.DT_name,m1.M_id,m1.M_startTime,m1.M_endTime, m2.MT_name,m1.M_power,p.PT_name,m1.M_addScore, now()>m1.M_endTime as expired FROM Member m1, MemberType m2, PowerType p, DegreeType d WHERE now()<m1.M_endTime AND m1.M_typeNo=m2.MT_no AND m1.M_power=p.PT_no AND m1.M_degreeNo=d.DT_no;

SELECT m1.M_memberNo,m1.M_name,m1.M_stuNo,m1.M_phone, m1.M_email,m1.M_gender,m1.M_discipline,m1.M_grade, m1.M_class,d.DT_name,m1.M_id,m1.M_startTime,m1.M_endTime, m2.MT_name,m1.M_power,p.PT_name,m1.M_addScore, now()>m1.M_endTime as expired FROM Member m1, MemberType m2, PowerType p, DegreeType d WHERE m1.M_name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') AND m1.M_typeNo=m2.MT_no AND m1.M_power=p.PT_no AND m1.M_degreeNo=d.DT_no;

SELECT m1.M_memberNo,m1.M_name,m1.M_stuNo,m1.M_phone, m1.M_email,m1.M_gender,m1.M_discipline,m1.M_grade, m1.M_class,d.DT_name,m1.M_id,m1.M_startTime,m1.M_endTime, m2.MT_name,m1.M_power,p.PT_name,m1.M_addScore, now()>m1.M_endTime as expired FROM Member m1, MemberType m2, PowerType p, DegreeType d WHERE m1.M_grade=#{grade} AND now()<m1.M_endTime AND now()>m1.M_endTime AND m1.M_memberNo=#{no} AND m1.M_name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') AND m1.M_typeNo=m2.MT_no AND m1.M_power=p.PT_no AND m1.M_degreeNo=d.DT_no;
